comments.author: Kathy - Panini Happy
comments.content: Thanks so much again, Michael, for sharing this fabulous sandwich!

comments.author: Alessandra
comments.content:
Hi Michael

long time no see! Thank you for your visit, and wow, your site has changed a lot since the last   time I visited you: It looks great! Sorry if I haven't been around, I got incredibly busy and although I am blogging a lot I am starting to lose track of my followers, and of the blogs I follow, but I am sure that you can understand that :-).

Ciao and keep well

Alessandra
